title: Unisex UV Protection Windbreaker
body_html:
Key Features & Benefits:
✔ UPF 50+ Sun Protection – Blocks harmful UV rays during outdoor activities
✔ Featherlight & Breathable – High-performance fiber fabric for all-day comfort
✔ Full Wind Protection – Shields against breezes without trapping heat
✔ 9 Vibrant Colors – White/Black/Yellow/Navy/Pink/Green/Rose Red/Blue/Orange
✔ Elastic Cuffs & Hem – Secure fit for running, hiking, or casual wear
✔ Packable Design – Easy to fold and carry for travel

Size Guide (Asian Sizing):
Bust/Length/Sleeve (cm)
S(98/64/67) | M(102/66/69) | L(106/68/73)
XL(110/70/76) | XXL(114/72/79) | 3XL(118/74/81)
→ *Runs 1-2 sizes small* – Size up if between measurements

What’s Included:
1x UV Protection Windbreaker Jacket

Pro Tip:
• Hand wash cold to maintain fabric integrity and UV protection
